targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("host" = 'rpi' AND "wwn" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'rpi' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
